data.event: In 1911 Bandera was transformed into a prominent community . The then faithful Catholics of that time called for the establishment of a parish, precisely in the same year that the independent parish, and subsequently diocese, of AÃ±atuya was formed.

These met in an official meeting on September 12, 1912 and made the first act in which it was unanimously decided that San Isidro Labrador would be named as the patron saint of the community of San Francisc Solano.
